page.title: 08CLUBS IN ELSWICK
page.content: At the{Elswick Leisure Pool}there are many clubs for the young people of Elswick.There are activities such as swimming, judo,canoeing, soft play, tennis, football and netball. At the swimming club they teach you how to swim and how to life save. You can play on the diving board and the slide. At the{soft play club}you can play hide and seek but you have to take off your shoes and socks. There is a girl's club and every year they have a play day when there are roundabouts, stalls and raffles. Children march in the South Benwell Crusaders which is a {juvenile jazz band.}The uniform is purple and white, it is just a plain dress with a white V and they wear white hats with silver and purple bands on them. The band competes against jazz bands from other areas.
